short_summary: Procurement of customized stamps, seal embossers and associated accessories.
description: This tender notice and solicitation documents are available on MERX at the following link: Stamps, Seal Embossers, And Associated Accessories - 2024074 | MERX. Contact: Kaouthar Gherairi, Officer, Procurement, contractingserv@parl.gc.ca
full_summary:
**Stamps, Seal Embossers, and Associated Accessories**
==============================================

**Tender Reference Number:** 2024074

**Publication Date:** November 19, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** December 6, 2024, at 13:00 (EST)

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services

**Request for:** Stamps, Seal Embossers, and Associated Accessories

The House of Commons seeks to purchase customized stamps, seal embossers, and associated accessories for Members of Parliament, Members' Constituency Offices, and the House Administration on an as-and-when-required basis.

**Key Requirements:**

* Provision of customized stamps
* Supply of seal embossers
* Delivery of associated accessories

**Incomplete Solicitation Documents:** There is no charge to preview the solicitation documents; however, registration with MERX is required. Select the "Free" option to access the documents.

**Accessing Solicitation Documents:** To ensure accurate and comprehensive information, please access the solicitation documents directly through the MERX platform at [Stamps, Seal Embossers, And Associated Accessories - 2024074 | MERX](https://www.merx.com/merx/search/action?q=2024074#keyword_box).

**Contact Information:**

* Kaouthar Gherairi, Officer, Procurement
* Contracting Serv, contractingserv@parl.gc.ca
* (613) 992-8688

**Notice Type:** Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR), Canada

**Contracting Entity:** House of Commons
